page.title: Jimmy Buffett sound board live albums

revisions.rev:
'''Jimmy Buffett sound board live albums''' are a series of [[live album]]s by [[United States|American]] [[singer-songwriter]] [[Jimmy Buffett]] recorded directly from the [[mixing console|sound board]] without further editing thus resembling [[bootleg recording]]s. The albums were recorded at various [[concert]]s throughout the United States and represent typical Buffett live shows of their era with most of the albums recorded during Buffett's 2003 Tiki Time Tour. They have been released on [[compact disc]] on Buffett's own [[Mailboat Records]] distributed by [[RCA Records|RCA]].
==Live in Auburn, WA== {{main|Live in Auburn, WA}} '''''Live in Auburn, WA''''' or '''''Live in Auburn (Seattle), WA''''' was recorded at [[White River Amphitheatre]] in [[Auburn, Washington]] on 16 September 2003. It was released in November 2003 on two [[compact disc]]s on [[Mailboat Records|Mailboat]] 2100.
==Live in Las Vegas, NV==<!-- This section is linked from [[Live in Las Vegas, NV]] and [[Live in Las Vegas]] --> '''''Live in Las Vegas, NV''''' was recorded at [[MGM Grand Garden Arena]] in [[Las Vegas, Nevada]] on 20 September 2003. It was released in November 2003 on two [[compact disc]]s on [[Mailboat Records|Mailboat]] 2102 and reached #13 on the [[Independent Albums|''Billboard'' Top Independent Albums]] chart.
===Track listing=== {{Empty section|date=June 2008}} ==Live in Cincinnati, OH==<!-- This section is linked from [[Live in Cincinnati, OH]] and [[Live in Cincinnati]] --> '''''Live in Cincinnati, OH''''' was recorded at [[Riverbend Music Center]] in [[Cincinnati, Ohio]] on 26 August 2003. It was released in January 2004 on two [[compact disc]]s on [[Mailboat Records|Mailboat]] 2106.
===Track listing=== '''Disc One''' #Great Heart #Gypsies in the Palace #Saxophones #In the Shelter #Honey Do #Son of a Son of a Sailor #Knees of My Heart #Burn That Bridge #Natives Are Restless #Come Monday #It's Five O'Clock Somewhere #One Particular Harbour #Cheeseburger in Paradise
'''Disc Two''' #Tiki Bar Is Open #Everybody's Talkin' #Why Don't We Get Drunk #This Hotel Room #It's My Job #Tampico Trauma #Pirate Looks at Forty #Changes in Latitudes, Changes in Attitudes #Boomerang #Mexico #Margaritaville #Volcano #Fins #Southern Cross #Growing Older, But Not Up
===Track listing=== {{Empty section|date=June 2008}} ==Live in Mansfield, MA==<!-- This section is linked from [[Live in Mansfield, MA]] and [[Live in Mansfield]] --> '''''Live in Mansfield, MA''''' or '''''Live in Mansfield (Boston), MA''''' was recorded at [[Tweeter Center for the Performing Arts]] in [[Mansfield, Massachusetts]] on 30 August 2003. It was released in January 2004 on two [[compact disc]]s on [[Mailboat Records|Mailboat]] 2107.
===Track listing=== '''Disc One''' #Great Heart <small>(Johnny Clegg)</small> #Gravity Storms <small>(Jimmy Buffett, Jay Oliver)</small> #Gypsies In The Palace <small>(Jimmy Buffett)</small> #In The Shelter <small>(Jimmy Buffett)</small> #Honey Do <small>(Jimmy Buffett, Michael Utley)</small> #Son of a Son of a Sailor <small>(Jimmy Buffett)</small> #Knees of my Heart <small>(Jimmy Buffett, Michael Utley, Will Jennings)</small> #Coconut Telegraph <small>(Jimmy Buffett)</small> #Natives Are Restless <small>(Don Tiki)</small> #Come Monday <small>(Jimmy Buffett)</small> #It's Five O'Clock Somewhere <small>(Jim "Moose" Brown, Don Rollins)</small> #One Particular Harbour <small>(Jimmy Buffett, Bobby Holcomb)</small> #Cheeseburger In Paradise <small>(Jimmy Buffett)</small>
'''Disc Two:''' #Tiki Bar Is Open <small>(John Hiatt)</small> #Everybody's Talkin' <small>(Harry Nilsson)</small> #Why Don't We Get Drunk <small>(Jimmy Buffett)</small> #Wino And I Know <small>(Jimmy Buffett)</small> #It's My Job <small>(Mac McAnally)</small> #School Boy Heart <small>(Jimmy Buffett, Matt Betton)</small> #Pirate Looks At Forty <small>(Jimmy Buffett)</small> #Changes In Latitudes, Changes In Attitudes <small>(Jimmy Buffett)</small> #Apocalypso <small>(Matt Betton)</small> #Mexico <small>(James Taylor)</small> #Margaritaville <small>(Jimmy Buffett)</small> #Volcano <small>(Jimmy Buffett, Keith Sykes, Harry Dailey)</small> #Fins <small>(Jimmy Buffett, Deborah McColl, Barry Chance, Tom Corcoran)</small> #Sea Cruise <small>(Frankie Ford)</small> #Lovely Cruise <small>(Johnathan Baham)</small>
==Live in Hawaii==<!-- This section is linked from [[Live in Hawaii]] --> '''''Live in Hawaii''''' was recorded at the [[Waikiki Shell]] in [[Honolulu, Hawaii]] on 28 January 2004 and the [[Maui Arts & Cultural Center]] in [[Kahului, Hawaii]] on 30 January 2004. It was released in March 2005 on two [[compact disc]]s on [[Mailboat Records|Mailboat]] 2109. ''Live in Hawaii'' includes a bonus [[DVD]] containing 16 minutes of footage from the two shows. The show was introduced by [[Don Ho]] and featured performances by [[Martin Denny]] and [[Henry Kopono]].
===Track listing=== '''Disc 1''':
#"Introduction by Don Ho / Great Heart" #"Coconut Telegraph" #"Gypsies in the Palace" #"In the Shelter" #"Burn that Bridge" #"Son of a Son of a Sailor" #"Come Monday" #"Natives Are Restless Tonight" #"Grapefruit-Juicy Fruit" #"It's Five O'Clock Somewhere" #"One Particular Harbour" #"Cheeseburger in Paradise" #"We Are the People Our Parents Warned Us About" #"Quiet Village" (with Martin Denny)
'''Disc 2''':
#"Tiki Bar Is Open" #"Everybody's Talkin'" #"Why Don't We Get Drunk (And Screw)" #"Jolly Mon" #"It's My Job" #"Boat Drinks" #"Far Side of the World" #"A Pirate Looks at Forty" #"Changes in Latitudes, Changes in Attitudes" #"Mexico" #"Margaritaville" #"Volcano" (with Henry Kapono) #"Fins" #"Back to the Island" (with Henry Kapono) #"Stories We Could Tell"
== Live at Fenway Park== {{main|Live at Fenway Park}} '''''Live at Fenway Park''''' was recorded at [[Fenway Park]] [[stadium|ballpark]] in [[Boston, Massachusetts]] on 10 September and 12 September 2004. It was released in November 2005 on two [[compact disc]]s on [[Mailboat Records|Mailboat]] 2115. ''Live at Fenway Park'' includes a [[DVD]] containing 55 minutes of footage from the two shows.
== Live in Anguilla==<!-- This section is linked from [[Live in Anguilla]] --> '''''Live in Anguilla''''' was recorded at [[reggae]] singer [[Bankie Banx]]'s beach bar, the Dune Preserve, in Rendezvous Bay, [[Anguilla]], [[British West Indies]], and Banx appears on the cover of the album. It was released in November 2007 on two [[compact disc]]s on [[Mailboat Records|Mailboat]]. ''Live in Anguilla'' includes an 82-minute [[DVD]] of concert footage.
===Track listing=== '''Disc 1''':
#"[[Changes in Latitudes, Changes in Attitudes (song)|Changes in Latitudes, Changes in Attitudes]]" <small>(Jimmy Buffett)</small> #"Domino College" <small>(Jimmy Buffett, [[Dan Fogelberg]])</small> #"Waiting in Vain" <small>([[Bob Marley]])</small> #"When Salome Plays The Drum" <small>(Jimmy Buffett)</small> #"Grapefruit-Juicy Fruit" <small>(Jimmy Buffett)</small> #"[[Come Monday]]" <small>(Jimmy Buffett)</small> #"They Donât Dance Like Carmen No More" <small>(Jimmy Buffett)</small> #"[[It's Five O'Clock Somewhere (song)|It's Five O'Clock Somewhere]]" <small>(Jim "Moose" Brown, Don Rollins)</small> #"[[Cheeseburger In Paradise]]" <small>(Jimmy Buffett)</small> #"King of Somewhere Hot" <small>(Jimmy Buffett)</small> #"Treat Her Like a Lady" <small>(Jimmy Buffett)</small> #"Still In Paradise" <small>(Bankie Banx)</small> â with [[Bankie Banx]] #"[[Weather with You]]" <small>([[Neil Finn]], [[Tim Finn]])</small> #"[[One Particular Harbour (song)|One Particular Harbour]]" <small>(Jimmy Buffett, [[Bobby Holcomb]])</small>
'''Disc 2''':
#"[[Brown Eyed Girl]]" <small>([[Van Morrison]])</small> #"Carnival World" <small>(Jimmy Buffett, Roger Guth, Jay Oliver)</small> #"Autour du Rocher" <small>(Jimmy Buffett, Henri Ledee, Leon Ledee, Marcel Limodin, Jean-Jacques Kraif)</small> #"Son of a Son of a Sailor" <small>(Jimmy Buffett)</small> #"That's My Story and I'm Stickin' to It" <small>(Jimmy Buffett, Jay Oliver)</small> #"[[In My Room (song)|In My Room]]" <small>([[Brian Wilson]], [[Gary Usher]])</small> #"A Pirate Looks at Forty" <small>(Jimmy Buffett)</small> / "[[Redemption Song]]" <small>(Bob Marley)</small> #"[[Volcano (Jimmy Buffett song)|Volcano]]" <small>(Jimmy Buffett)</small> #"Desperation Samba (Halloween in Tijuana)" <small>(Jimmy Buffett, [[Will Jennings]], [[Timothy B. Schmit]])</small> #"[[Margaritaville]]" <small>(Jimmy Buffett)</small> #"[[Southern Cross (Crosby, Stills and Nash song)|Southern Cross]]" <small>([[Stephen Stills]], [[Richard Curtis (musician)|Richard Curtis]], [[Michael Curtis (musician)|Michael Curtis]])</small> #"[[Fins (song)|Fins]]" <small>(Jimmy Buffett, Deborah McColl, Barry Chance, [[Tom Corcoran (writer)|Tom Corcoran]])</small> #"Distantly in Love" <small>(Jimmy Buffett)</small> #"Chanson Pour Les Petits Enfants" <small>(Jimmy Buffett)</small> #"Thatâs What Living Is to Me" <small>(Jimmy Buffett)</small> #"One Particular Harbour" <small>(Jimmy Buffett, Bobby Holcomb)</small>
'''DVD''':
